mdException.name: net.geoprism.data.etl.excel.InvalidSpreadsheetNameExcepetion
mdException.label: Spreadsheet File Name
mdException.description: Thrown when a user tries to upload a spreadsheet with an incorect name.
mdException.message: The name of the spreadsheet you uploaded does not match an expected name.

mdException.name: net.geoprism.data.etl.excel.InvalidSpreadsheetTabNameException
mdException.label: Spreadsheet Tab Name
mdException.description: Thrown when a user tries to upload a spreadsheet with an incorect name.
mdException.message: The name of the [{tabLabel}] in the spreadsheet you uploaded does not match an expected tab name.

mdException.name: net.geoprism.data.etl.excel.MissingSpreadsheetTabException
mdException.label: Spreadsheet Missing Tabs
mdException.description: Thrown when a user tries to upload a spreadsheet that does not have all the expected tabs.
mdException.message: The uploaded spreadsheet is missing the required tab [{tabLabel}].

mdException.name: net.geoprism.data.etl.excel.ExtraSpreadsheetTabException
mdException.label: Spreadsheet Has Extra Tabs
mdException.description: Thrown when a user tries to upload a spreadsheet that has more tabs than expected.
mdException.message: The uploaded spreadsheet has one or more tabs than expected. Remove [{tabLabel}].

mdException.name: net.geoprism.data.etl.excel.ExtraSpreadsheetTabColumnException
mdException.label: Spreadsheet Tab Has Extra Columns
mdException.description: Thrown when a user tries to upload a spreadsheet that has a tab with more columns than expected.
mdException.message: The uploaded spreadsheet has a tab [{tabLabel}] with one or more columns than expected. Remove [{columnLabel}].

mdException.name: net.geoprism.data.etl.excel.MissingSpreadsheetTabColumnException
mdException.label: Spreadsheet Tab Missing Columns
mdException.description: Thrown when a user tries to upload a spreadsheet that has a tab that does not have all the expected columns.
mdException.message: The uploaded spreadsheet tab [{tabLabel}] is missing one or more required columns. Add [{columnLabel}].
